tarot.readingsExhaustedDescription: You've reached your daily limit of tarot readings. The cards need time to recharge their mystical energies. Return tomorrow for fresh insights into your crypto journey.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

cookiePage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePage.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how FUDfate uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.
cookiePage.cookiesDefinition: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website.
cookiePage.cookiesUsage: We use cookies to enhance your experience and understand how you use our website.
cookiePage.essentialCookies: Essential cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly
cookiePage.analyticsCookies: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
cookiePage.advertisingCookies: Advertising cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements
